column4: You said installing BFS do not help with flash performance. Is there something I missed about that thing?
Actually, I never tried that myself, but I read a lot of positive responses about that thing.

Video used to play smoothly for him before, and now it's signifigantly worse. That means that 1: There is a problem somewhere that has made his situation worse, that needs to be fixed 2: Trying to work around the root cause by getting slightly better general performance with BFS will not make up for the difference.
Thank you, I think I missed some of the information he provided.
